alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 7:02PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, southwestern Musselshell, west central Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 701 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Ryegate, or 30 miles north of Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, brief heavy rain and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broadview, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Rapelje and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
